content: make it more stable as doing blo makes the stitches loose insert the hook into the loop behind the bl as well as the bl when doing a double_crochet attaching granny squares together 4mm hook 1 line up the granny squares back to back* 2 insert hook into corner gap and slip_stitch single_crochet 3 into corner gap single_crochet into next stitch** 3 single_crochet 4 into each chain gap single_crochet 1 into next stitch x4 single_crochet 3 into corner gap 4 fasten_off and weave in ends 5 switch to the opposite side of the granny squares repeat step 2 single_crochet 2 into the next gap only 6 fasten_off and weave in ends go to the other end of the same side repeat steps 5-6 sides *the front is where there is an edge standing out in the middle of the granny square make sure that side faces inwards when stitching the granny squares together **the next stitch is basically the stitch between the gaps as single_crochet or cs have been done previously just single_crochet into those stitches ribbing 3 5mm hook base on the bottom side of the granny squares slip_stitch into a/next corner gap single_crochet 3 into the corner gap single_crochet into next stitch single_crochet 3 into next chain gap repeat until row ends slip_stitch into first single_crochet row 1 slip_stitch into first corner gap ch11 row 2 single_crochet into chain single_crochet 10 slip_stitch 2* into the next two stitches row 3 flip over skip the 2 slip_stitch and single_crochet 10 into blo of the ribbing chain 1 row 4 flip over single_crochet 10 into blo slip_stitch 2 into the next two stitches repeat row 3-4 until the ribbing covers around the whole mitten to stitch the ends of the ribbing together insert the hook into the back of the first row chain do not fasten_off from the last row and back to the back loop of the last row single_crochet single_crochet 10 into back of chain and single_crochet blo fasten_off and weave in ends top of the mitten 3mm hook 1 slip_stitch into a corner gap 2 single_crochet 2 into the corner gap single_crochet into next stitch 3 single_crochet 3 into each chain gap and repeat the same process as the base for the bottom ribbing only with 2 single_crochet into the corner gaps instead of 3 4 slip_stitch back into the first stitch fasten_off and weave in ends flip the mitten inside out and it s finished follow me on instagram @millycrochets_
